description:
### Description

US government profiles of countries and territories around the world. Information on geography, people, government, transportation, economy, communications, etc.

### Openness: OPEN

  * License: Public Domain: "The Factbook is in the public domain. Accordingly, it may be copied freely without permission of the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA)." [Source](https://www.cia.gov/library/publications/the-world-factbook/docs/contributor_copyright.html)
  * Access:
    * web: yes. (CIA website)
    * bulk: yes. (see download link)

A partial RDF conversion is available in package:world-factbook-fu-berlin.
title: The CIA World Factbook
name: cia-world-factbook
